name: Critical Dash
description:
Critical Dash is a 2 Player PONG game with modern elements.

  • Players are able to DASH as well as PUNCH at the ball.
  • Whenever a player loses a SET they will get a chance to adjust one of the rules.
  •  Share a Keyboard   (Simplified Controls.)
  •  Use Game  Controller / s (and play with enhanced Aiming.)

Shared Keyboard Controls:

MOVEWASDORARROW KEYSPUNCHBORMDASHVORN

Split Controls :

MOVEWASDORLEFT STICKAIMMOUSEORRIGHT STICKPUNCHRight Mouse ButtonORRight BumperDASHSPACEORLeft Bumper

NOTE: The game was designed to accommodate 2 GameControllers, but this has not been tested. We recommend one KEYBOARD+MOUSE and one CONTROLLER.
